ARTICLE.CONTENT:
1. Commodities used as highly-liquid stores of value:
    1. coins with a gold content of at least 90 %; and
    2. bullion such as bars, nuggets or clumps with a gold content of at least 99,5 %.
  2. Prepaid cards: P.M.
ARTICLE.SUBTITLE: Commodities used as highly-liquid stores of value and prepaid cards which are considered cash in accordance with point (a)(iii) and (iv) of Article 2(1)
ARTICLE.TITLE: ANNEX I
